nodes.text: This Moogan was a male native to the planet Mooga. He, like many others of his race, had green skin and yellow eyes. On at least one occasion he visited the Zygerria with the goal to participate in the Royal slave auction.

This Moogan traveled to Zygerria around 21 BBY to take part in the Royal slave auction that Queen Miraj Scintel was hosting after the capture of the Togruta from Kiros. He was seen next to Nix Card and exclaimed after Obi-Wan Kenobi was revealed as a possible slave.
